page.title: 12YOXALL_RELIGION
page.content: The Revd. John Cutler B.D.(Lond) is rector of the 12th C. Parish Church of St.Peter,and Dean's Vicar of Lichfield Cathedral.There are 100 names on the Electoral Roll with an average congregation of 85.The church has both burial ground and cemetery adjacent. Charity legacies have been amalgamated into one fund to help the needy.Father David Hutt, secular parish priest of the Archdiocese of Birmingham,serves 116 baptised Roman Catholics at the Wood Lane church of St.Francis de Sales 1793.The congregation of 72 is above the national average of 40%.The Methodist church of St.Paul,Woodmill built 1870 serves 7 families with an average congregation of 12.The minister is Rev.Tom Smith of the Burton-on-Trent circuit. Congregations have all increased recently.Both small churches have burial grounds.
